body.p: Biological transformation results in the following types of outcomes:

li.p: asset changes through (i) growth (an increase in quantity or improvement in quality of an animal or plant), (ii) degeneration (a decrease in the quantity or deterioration in quality of an animal or plant), or (iii) procreation (creation of additional living animals or plants); or
production of agricultural produce such as latex, tea leaf, wool, and milk.
